full_dialogue: Turn 3 [Speaker_1]: yes book it for 4 people and 3 nights starting from thursday. Turn 4 [Speaker_2]: <|MASK|> Turn 5 [Speaker_1]: Wow, thanks. Could you please also find me a college to visit in the centre area?
response_1: Ok. I was able to complete the booking. Your reference number is 3PQEENI7.
response_2: Your room has been booked, ref#1X approving for 4 people, 3 nights starting on Thursday.

full_dialogue: Turn 15 [Speaker_1]: All right, let's fix it at 450 pieces then. And for every additional 50 pianos sold, we'll give you 1 % higher commission. Turn 16 [Speaker_2]: <|MASK|> Turn 17 [Speaker_1]: We would like to make a specific mention of one more point. As our sole distributor, you will neither handle the same or similar products of other origins nor re-export our goods to any other area outside your own.
response_1: One %.
response_2: I suppose all the other terms remain unchanged.

full_dialogue: Turn 1 [Speaker_1]: Hello, Miss Wu, This is Dan Robson calling from OTC limited. I'd like to check my last order. When exactly was it sent out? Turn 2 [Speaker_2]: <|MASK|> Turn 3 [Speaker_1]: Sure. No problem.
response_1: I can check that for you right now. Would you mind holding?
response_2: Let me check, if I have finished this, can you look it over with me?

full_dialogue: Turn 1 [Speaker_1]: Fill in the slip , stating the exact amount you wish to withdraw , please . Turn 2 Speaker_2: <|MASK|>  Turn 3 [Speaker_1]: OK , do you want large notes or small ones ?
response_1: OK . Here's my bank book , is that all right ?
response_2: I'd like to withdraw £XXXXXXX from my account, please.

full_dialogue: Turn 1 [Speaker_1]: Could you give me the address and postcode? Turn 2 Speaker_2: <|MASK|>  Turn 3 [Speaker_1]: No, you've been very helpful. Thank you.
response_1: The address is XXXXXXX and the postcode is XXXXXXX. Is there anything else I can help you with?
response_2: They are a 1 station road, postcode cb12jb, any other questions today?

full_dialogue: Turn 17 [Speaker_1]: Yeah, I'm very nauseous. It's mostly nausea and a fever. Turn 18 [Speaker_2]: <|MASK|> Turn 19 [Speaker_1]: Thanks, Ann. Talk to you this afternoon.
response_1: Well, I'll cancel your appointments for today. And I'll tell Mr. Morley.
response_2: Well, hang in there. Those have the kind of problems that usually take a few days to resolve. Don't worry, we'll talk again.

full_dialogue: Turn 1 [Speaker_1]: I would really love to have some chinese food while I am in town. Turn 2 Speaker_2: <|MASK|>  Turn 3 [Speaker_1]: I would prefer the south if there is anything available there.
response_1: We have lots of Chinese Restaurants in town. Is there a particular area of town you would like to dine in?
response_2: I can help you find Chinese restaurants in town. There are several options available in different areas. What area of town would you prefer, or do you have any other preferences like price range?

full_dialogue: Turn 7 [Speaker_1]: The procedure is really simple and convenient. All you need to do is fill in this Loan Application form. Turn 8 [Speaker_2]: <|MASK|> Turn 9 [Speaker_1]: Of course, we'll need some documentation from you. Like your resident permit, proof of salary and your USD Deposit Certificate, to use as collateral.
response_1: Right... anything else?
response_2: Will you require any documentation?

full_dialogue: Turn 1 [Speaker_1]: You ’ re free to leave . Turn 2 Speaker_2: <|MASK|>  Turn 3 [Speaker_1]: What are you planning on doing now ?
response_1: I ’ m so excited .
response_2: Thank you. I appreciate that.

full_dialogue: Turn 11 [Speaker_1]: No but I would like a train on wednesday at 15:30 from stansted airport to cambridge. Turn 12 [Speaker_2]: <|MASK|> Turn 13 [Speaker_1]: The train needs to arrive by 15:30
response_1: I have a train leaving at 16:24 from stansted airport. Would you like me to book that for you?
response_2: I have 4 trains available.

full_dialogue: Turn 1 [Speaker_1]: I need you to find a hotel so I have a place to stay. It doesn't need to include internet, but it should include free parking. Turn 2 [Speaker_2]: <|MASK|> Turn 3 [Speaker_1]: Can you tell me more about the Acorn guest house before we look at booking. I'm looking for a moderately priced room and some other amenities.
response_1: There are 18 hotels that fit your needs. Is there a certain price range or area of town you would like to stay in?
response_2: I like acorn guest house. Need me to book a room?

full_dialogue: Turn 1 [Speaker_1]: I just want to make sure we arrive by the reservation time to the restaurant. Turn 2 Speaker_2: <|MASK|>  Turn 3 [Speaker_1]: That is all. Thank you for your help.
response_1: Booking completed! Booked car type : yellow ford Contact number : 07311583269
response_2: I understand you want to arrive on time for your restaurant reservation. Your taxi is booked and will arrive at XXXXXXX to get you there by XXXXXXX. Is there anything else I can help you with?

full_dialogue: Turn 1 [Speaker_1]: How long is the ride? Turn 2 Speaker_2: <|MASK|>  Turn 3 [Speaker_1]: No but can you tell me how much the ticket costs?
response_1: The ride is 28 minutes. Would you like me to book a ticket?
response_2: The ride takes XXXXXXX minutes.

full_dialogue: Turn 1 [Speaker_1]: it was really busy . I had to work straight through my lunch break . Turn 2 Speaker_2: <|MASK|>  Turn 3 [Speaker_1]: my boss told me that I could either go home early or take a long lunch break another day , so I decided to wait and take a long lunch break another time .
response_1: did you get to leave early then ?
response_2: That sounds really stressful having to work through your lunch break. What did you decide to do about it?

full_dialogue: Turn 7 [Speaker_1]: I'm looking for an expensive place to eat in the centre, what is there that fits that criteria? Turn 8 [Speaker_2]: <|MASK|> Turn 9 [Speaker_1]: It doesn't matter what kind of food. What would you recommend for a large group of 8 people?
response_1: There are 33 expensive restaurants in the centre. Do you have a preference for type of food?
response_2: There 33 places that fit your criteria. Do you have a particular cuisine type in mind so that I can narrow the results down?

response_2: Someone else is making charges on my debit card .

response_2: We have 23 different options available. Is there an area you would prefer?

response_2: Hello. I need to come in for an appointment.
